contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Kumiyama |JapaneseName= 久御山町 |settlement_type=Town |MapImage= Kumiyama in Kyoto-fu.png |Region= [[Kansai]] |Prefecture= [[Kyoto Prefecture|Kyoto]] |District= [[Kuse District, Kyoto|Kuse District]] |Area_km2= 13.86 |PopDate= 2008 |Population= 17,125 |Density_km2= 1.191 |Coords= {{coord|34|53|N|135|44|E|region:JP_type:city}} |LatitudeDegrees = 34 |LatitudeMinutes = 53 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 135 |LongtitudeMinutes = 44 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage=Flag of Kumiyama Kyoto.JPG |SymbolDescription=Flag |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.kumiyama.kyoto.jp/ Town of Kumiyama] }} {{nihongo|'''Kumiyama'''|久御山町|Kumiyama-chō}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kuse District, Kyoto|Kuse District]], [[Kyoto Prefecture|Kyoto]], [[Japan]]. As of 2008, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 17,125 and a [[population density|density]] of 1,191.85 persons per km². The total area is 13.86 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.town.kumiyama.kyoto.jp/ Kumiyama official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Kyoto Prefecture]] {{Kyoto-geo-stub}}
